attributes.additional_details: mental health is deteriorating in young people and we feel as though there is not enough time to re teach ourselves a level content. we have been out of school for such a long time that we cannot be thrown into the deep end and made to do exams. wales and Scotland have cancelled exams for 2021 - it is generally the right thing to do due to the fact they don't expect students to sit exams when the consequences of the virus has totally messed up their whole academic system of learning.
attributes.background: how can it be expected of students to complete a levels and gcses after missing so much school, having to self teach hefty content and with the academic stress of needing to achieve high grades when students can hardly get their head wrapped around the content, it seems absurd for exams to go ahead.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
